fields.title: Bayesian PCA
fields.pointers:
*  [Probabilistic matrix factorization (PMF)](probabilistic_matrix_factorization)  is another Bayesian formulation of PCA, used for predicting missing entries of a matrix.
* We can perform inference in this model using  [Gibbs sampling](gibbs_sampling) .
fields.summary: By formulating PCA as a Bayesian model, we can auotmatically choose a latent dimensionality by maximizing the (approximate) marginal likelihood of the model.
